questions.question: They have less bones than humans
questions.actual: They have 230 to 250 bones, humans have 206 bones

questions.question: A group of kittens is called a kindle
All cats hate water?
questions.actual: While many cats dislike water, some actually enjoy it

questions.question: Their brain is 60% similar to a human's brain
questions.actual: Their brain is 90% similar to a human's brain

questions.question: They have a specialized collarbone that allows them to always land on their feet
questions.actual: They have a flexible spine and a highly developed inner ear that helps them land on their feet, not a specialized collarbone

questions.question: They have a sweet tooth and enjoy sugary foods
questions.actual: They can't taste sweet flavors and shouldn't consume sugary foods

questions.question: The largest breed the Maine Coon
Hairballs are a normal and healthy part of a cat's digestive process
questions.actual: Frequent hairballs may indicate a problem; they should not be too common

questions.question: They can be left-pawed or right-pawed
